mapper.update: UPDATE tb_info_board AS info SET info.info_board_view_cnt = info.info_board_view_cnt + 1 WHERE info.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode};

UPDATE tb_info_board AS info SET info.info_board_title = #{infoBoardTitle}, info.info_board_content = #{infoBoardContent}, info.info_board_reg_time = NOW() WHERE info.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode};

UPDATE tb_info_board_comment AS comm SET comm.info_board_comment_content = #{infoBoardCommentContent}, comm.info_board_comment_reg_time = NOW() WHERE comm.info_board_comment_code = #{infoBoardCommentCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_info_board_comment AS comm WHERE comm.info_board_comment_code = #{infoBoardCommentCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_info_board_comment ( info_board_comment_code, info_board_code, user_id, info_board_comment_content, info_board_comment_reg_time ) VALUE ( #{infoBoardCommentCode}, #{infoBoardCode}, #{userId}, #{infoBoardCommentContent}, NOW() );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_info_board_comment AS comm WHERE comm.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_info_board ( info_board_code, user_id, info_board_title, info_board_content, info_board_like_cnt, info_board_view_cnt, info_board_reg_time ) VALUES ( #{infoBoardCode}, #{userId}, #{infoBoardTitle}, #{infoBoardContent}, 0, 0, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT info.info_board_code, info.info_board_title, u.user_nickname, info.info_board_like_cnt, info.info_board_view_cnt, info.info_board_reg_time FROM tb_info_board AS info INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON info.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING(info.info_board_code, 11) AS UNSIGNED) DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};

SELECT u.user_nickname, info.user_id, info.info_board_code, info.info_board_title, info.info_board_content, info.info_board_like_cnt, info.info_board_view_cnt, info.info_board_reg_time FROM tb_info_board AS info INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON info.user_id = u.user_id WHERE info.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode};

SELECT u.user_nickname, comm.info_board_comment_code, comm.user_id, comm.info_board_comment_content, comm.info_board_comment_reg_time FROM tb_info_board AS info INNER JOIN tb_info_board_comment AS comm ON info.info_board_code = comm.info_board_code INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON comm.user_id = u.user_id WHERE comm.info_board_code = #{infoBoardCode}
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
